snippet: ClearEdge Power,  based in Oregon, has announced a deal with Gussing Renewable Energy of Austria to supply 8.5 megawatts of fuel cells to run on methane made from renewable sources.
abstract: ClearEdge Power,  based in Oregon, has announced a deal with Gussing Renewable Energy of Austria to supply 8.5 megawatts of fuel cells to run on methane made from renewable sources.
